column1: #Text=[0329]The compound of Example 54 (3.17 g) containing inseparable isomers was dissolved in toluene (72.5 mL).
#Text=To this solution, activated manganese dioxide (6.31 g) was added and the mixture was stirred for 7 hours under reflux.
#Text=Subsequently, additional activated manganese dioxide (6.31 g) was added and the mixture was stirred for another 6 hours under reflux.
#Text=The insoluble material was removed by filtration and the filtrate was evaporated.
#Text=The residue was purified by silica gel column chromatography (hexane:ethyl acetate=4:1).
#Text=The resulting yellow oil was again oxidized and purified to afford the title compound as a yellow powder (850 mg).
